user_story: As a student, I want a planner that allows me to schedule my classes and assignments so that I can keep track of my academic responsibilities.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to schedule classes and assignments successfully.
2. The system shall provide clear feedback after each scheduling action.
3. The system shall validate user inputs and display relevant error messages.
4. The system shall handle exceptions without crashing and maintain operational stability.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to schedule classes and assignments successfully.
2. The system shall provide clear feedback after each scheduling action.
3. The system shall validate user inputs and display relevant error messages.
4. The system shall handle exceptions without crashing and maintain operational stability.
final_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to schedule classes and assignments successfully.
2. The system shall handle exceptions without crashing and maintain operational stability.
3. The system shall allow a student to add a new assignment entry, including its name, due date, and associated class.
4. The system shall display a unified view of all scheduled classes and assignments.
